title: Base Entity
description: The absolute base schema for any persistent, identifiable object in the system, whether cognitive or systemic. Defines the universal properties shared by all entities.

title.description: The human-readable, PascalCase name of the object (e.g., 'UniversalPhysicsState').

description.description: A clear, complete sentence explaining the object's purpose and function within the system.

schema_version.description: The semantic version of this schema definition (e.g., '1.0.0').

entity_id.title: Entity ID Field
entity_id.description: A reusable definition for a unique entity identifier.

tenant_id.title: UUID
tenant_id.description: A canonical definition for a Universally Unique Identifier (UUID).

created_at.title: Timestamp
created_at.description: A canonical definition for an ISO 8601 timestamp with timezone.
